data.title: Bache, Sarah Franklin to Benjamin Franklin, 1782 October 01
data.text: Sarah Franklin Bache writes to her father, Benjamin Franklin. She updates him on her family, describing her youngest--Deborah Franklin Bache--as "perfect" and newly weaned, she describes William as "tall" and "straight" and learning to dance, Louis and Elizabeth are being educated by Madam Marsh. Franklin Bache also writes about Mr Barclay and "his Lady" who are now in France.
